        public NodeThread​(NodesManager nMan,
                  java.lang.Integer id,
                  java.lang.Long n,
                  java.lang.Double excitProportion,
                  java.lang.Integer k,
                  java.lang.Double prew,
                  java.lang.Integer Bn,
                  java.lang.Double IBI,
                  java.lang.Double D_exc,
                  java.lang.Double D_inh,
                  java.lang.Double ld,
                  java.lang.Double kr,
                  java.lang.Double mu_w_exc,
                  java.lang.Double mu_w_inh,
                  java.lang.Double sigma_w_exc,
                  java.lang.Double sigma_w_inh,
                  java.lang.Double w_pre_exc,
                  java.lang.Double w_pre_inh,
                  java.lang.Double externalPresynapticDefVal,
                  java.lang.Boolean plasticity,
                  java.lang.Double etap,
                  java.lang.Double etam,
                  java.lang.Double taup,
                  java.lang.Double taum,
                  java.lang.Double pwMax,
                  java.lang.Double to,
                  java.lang.Double avgNeuronalSignalSpeed,
                  java.lang.Boolean lif,
                  java.lang.Boolean exp_decay,
                  java.lang.Boolean do_fast)
        The NodeThread object
        Parameters:
        nMan - the simulation NodesManager object
        id - the node id
        n - the number of neurons of the node
        excitProportion - the ratio of excitatory neurons over the total number of neurons 'n'
        k - the conn-degree of each neuron
        prew - the prob of small-world topology rewinig
        Bn - the number of bursts spike for each firing neuron
        IBI - the burst inter-spike time
        D_exc -
        D_inh -
        mu_w_exc - the mean of the postsynaptic weight distribution for excitatory neurons
        mu_w_inh - the mean of the postsynaptic weight distribution for inhibitory neurons
        sigma_w_exc - the std deviation of the postsynaptic weight distribution for excitatory neurons
        sigma_w_inh - the std deviation of the postsynaptic weight distribution for inhibitory neurons
        w_pre_exc - the presynaptic weight for excitatory neurons
        w_pre_inh - the presynaptic weight for inhibitory neurons
        externalPresynapticDefVal -
        plasticity - simulate neuron plasticity
        etap - the Etap for plasticity
        etam - the Etam for plasticity
        taup - the Taup for plasticity
        taum - the Taum for plasticity
        pwMax - the pwMax for plasticity
        to - the to for plasticity
        avgNeuronalSignalSpeed - the signal speed through synapsis
        lif - do lif simulation
        exp_decay - use exponential sub-threashold decay
        do_fast - use fastest algorithms (some aproximations)

      • NodeThread

        public NodeThread​(NodesManager nMan,
                  java.lang.Integer id,
                  java.lang.Long n,
                  java.lang.Integer externalInputs,
                  int externalInputType,
                  java.lang.Double externalInputsTimeOffset,
                  double timeStep,
                  int fireDuration,
                  java.lang.Double externalAmplitude,
                  java.lang.Double excitRatio,
                  java.lang.Integer k,
                  java.lang.Double prew,
                  java.lang.Integer Bn,
                  java.lang.Double IBI,
                  java.lang.Double c,
                  java.lang.Double D_exc,
                  java.lang.Double D_inh,
                  java.lang.Double t_arp,
                  java.lang.Double mu_w_exc,
                  java.lang.Double mu_w_inh,
                  java.lang.Double sigma_w_exc,
                  java.lang.Double sigma_w_inh,
                  java.lang.Double w_pre_exc,
                  java.lang.Double w_pre_inh,
                  java.lang.Double externalPresynapticDefVal,
                  java.lang.Boolean plasticity,
                  java.lang.Double etap,
                  java.lang.Double etam,
                  java.lang.Double taup,
                  java.lang.Double taum,
                  java.lang.Double pwMax,
                  java.lang.Double to,
                  java.lang.Double avgNeuronalSignalSpeed,
                  java.lang.Boolean lif,
                  java.lang.Boolean exp_decay,
                  java.lang.Boolean do_fast)
        The NodeThread object
        Parameters:
        nMan - the simulation NodesManager object
        id - the node id
        n - the number of neurons of the node
        externalInputs - the number of neurons with external inputs
        externalInputType - the type of external input 0. poisson 1. constant 2.noise
        externalInputsTimeOffset - the time offset before external input firings to begin
        timeStep - the avg for the external input fire distribution
        fireDuration - the duration of external input activity
        externalAmplitude - the amplitude of an external input signal
        excitRatio - the ratio of excitatory neurons over the total number of neurons 'n'
        k - the conn-degree of each neuron
        prew - the prob of small-world topology rewinig
        Bn - the number of bursts spike for each firing neuron
        IBI - the burst inter-spike time
        D_exc -
        D_inh -
        mu_w_exc - the mean of the postsynaptic weight distribution for excitatory neurons
        mu_w_inh - the mean of the postsynaptic weight distribution for inhibitory neurons
        sigma_w_exc - the std deviation of the postsynaptic weight distribution for excitatory neurons
        sigma_w_inh - the std deviation of the postsynaptic weight distribution for inhibitory neurons
        w_pre_exc - the presynaptic weight for excitatory neurons
        w_pre_inh - the presynaptic weight for inhibitory neurons
        externalPresynapticDefVal -
        plasticity - simulate neuron plasticity
        etap - the Etap for plasticity
        etam - the Etam for plasticity
        taup - the Taup for plasticity
        taum - the Taum for plasticity
        pwMax - the pwMax for plasticity
        to - the to for plasticity
        avgNeuronalSignalSpeed - the signal speed through synapsis
        lif - do lif simulation
        exp_decay - use exponential sub-threashold decay
        do_fast - use fastest algorithms (some aproximations)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init​(NodesManager nMan,
                 java.lang.Double c,
                 java.lang.Double D_exc,
                 java.lang.Double D_inh,
                 java.lang.Double t_arp,
                 java.lang.Double excitatoryPresynapticDefVal,
                 java.lang.Double inhibithoryPresynapticDefVal,
                 java.lang.Double externalPresynapticDefVal,
                 java.lang.Double avgNeuronalSignalSpeed,
                 java.lang.Boolean lif,
                 java.lang.Boolean exp_decay,
                 java.lang.Boolean do_fast)
        The initialization function for NodeThread
        Parameters:
        nMan - the NodesManager
        c -
        D_exc -
        D_inh -
        t_arp -
        excitatoryPresynapticDefVal - the presynaptic weight for excitatory neurons
        inhibithoryPresynapticDefVal - the presynaptic weight for inhibitory neurons
        externalPresynapticDefVal - the presynaptic weight for external inputs
        avgNeuronalSignalSpeed - the avg signal through axons
        lif - if true, a least integrate and fire simulation is performed
        exp_decay - if true, the underthreashold neuronal decay would be exponential
        do_fast - if true, fastest algorithm are used for expensive calculations. This introduces some kind of aproximations

      • addInterNodeSynapse

        public void addInterNodeSynapse​(java.lang.Integer firingNodeId,
                                java.lang.Long firingNeuronId,
                                java.lang.Integer burningNodeId,
                                java.lang.Long burningNeuronId,
                                java.lang.Double presynaptic_w,
                                java.lang.Double mu,
                                java.lang.Double lambda)
        create and adds a new inter-node synapse
        Parameters:
        firingNodeId - the id of the firing node
        firingNeuronId - the id of the firing neuron (within a node)
        burningNodeId - the id of the burning node
        burningNeuronId - the id of the burning neuron (within a node)
        presynaptic_w - the presynaptic weight of the synapse
        mu - the postsynaptic weight for the synapse
        lambda - the avg length of the inter-node axon
